search_specialcos02/4001_1001_0100_10:
Let’s see. I heard the first puzzle would be
around here somewhere...
search_specialcos02/4001_1001_0300_10:
Welcome! My name is Cilan. I work as a waiter in
the Unova region’s Striaton City.
search_specialcos02/4001_1001_0500_10: And I am Cress. Please remember us in the future!
search_specialcos02/4001_1001_0600_10:
We heard you were having a tea party and
figured we couldn’t possibly miss out on that!
So here we are!
search_specialcos02/4001_1001_0700_10:
Yes, we’re quite confident in our knowledge
of tea.
search_specialcos02/4001_1001_0800_10: I select only the best tea leaves...
search_specialcos02/4001_1001_1000_10:
And then Chili pours the water after heating it to
just the perfect temperature.
search_specialcos02/4001_1001_1100_10:
We believe that the tea we make this way is the
best in all of Unova... No, in the whole world!
search_specialcos02/4001_1001_1200_10: Wow, you all must really love tea! I do, too!
search_specialcos02/4001_1001_1300_10: Then I’m sure we’ll get along splendidly.
search_specialcos02/4001_1001_1400_10:
We’re still quite new to Pasio, so we’d appreciate
any good tea shop recommendations.
search_specialcos02/4001_1001_1500_10:
And personally, I’m very interested in
that Polteageist.
search_specialcos02/4001_1001_1600_10: Might it be an Antique Form Polteageist?
search_specialcos02/4001_1001_1700_10: Yes, apparently! People often tell me it’s rare.
search_specialcos02/4001_1001_1800_10:
This Pokémon doesn’t live in the Alola region, so
I don’t really know much about it...
search_specialcos02/4001_1001_1900_10:
Well, good tea doesn’t get its quality from the
teapot.
search_specialcos02/4001_1001_2000_10:
The most important thing for both tea and Pokémon
is putting your heart into it!
search_specialcos02/4001_1001_2300_10:
The three of us pooled our knowledge to come up
with this challenge, so I hope you enjoy it.
search_specialcos02/4002_1001_0100_10: Well, we made it through the cave!
search_specialcos02/4002_1001_0200_10:
What kind of puzzle do you think we’ll be faced
with next?
search_specialcos02/4002_1001_0300_10: We’ll be conducting your next puzzle!
search_specialcos02/4003_1001_0100_10:
We came up with the next puzzle for you! Please
enjoy yourselves!
search_specialcos02/4003_1001_0200_10: Both of you have such wonderful outfits!
search_specialcos02/4003_1001_0300_10:
Thank you! We consider this to be the most
suitable attire for a tea party!
search_specialcos02/4003_1001_0400_10:
We have no experience as butlers specifically, but
as Subway Bosses, we already share the same
dedication to service and hospitality!
search_specialcos02/4003_1001_0500_10:
We hope this experience brings us and our guests
even closer together!
search_specialcos02/4003_1001_0600_10: I can see how dedicated you are!
search_specialcos02/4003_1001_0700_10:
We’ve also just gotten new partner Pokémon,
so we’re hoping to deepen our bonds with them
through this event as well.
search_specialcos02/4003_1001_0800_10: Our partner Pokémon are Escavalier and Accelgor.
search_specialcos02/4003_1001_0900_10:
These special Pokémon can only evolve when
Karrablast and Shelmet are brought together.
search_specialcos02/4003_1001_1000_10:
That’s exactly why Ingo and I have raised
them together!
search_specialcos02/4003_1001_1100_10: They make a great combination, just as we do!
search_specialcos02/4003_1001_1200_10:
Oh my. I’m guessing you’ve come up with a really
difficult puzzle, then...
search_specialcos02/4003_1001_1300_10: That’s correct! It won’t be an easy one!
search_specialcos02/4003_1001_1400_10: But the rules are quite simple!
search_specialcos02/4003_1001_1500_10:
If you make it through the cave up ahead, you’ll
reach the next destination.
search_specialcos02/4003_1001_1600_10:
Accelgor and Escavalier will be waiting along the
correct path, so be sure to follow them!
search_specialcos02/4003_1001_1700_10: What happens if we take the wrong path?
search_specialcos02/4003_1001_1800_10: You may come across something rather frightening!
search_specialcos02/4003_1001_2000_10:
If something scary happens, I’ll leave it to you to
take care of, [Name:PlayerNickname ]...
search_specialcos02/4003_1001_2100_10:
And with that, we’ll send you on your way!
Take care!
search_specialcos02/4004_1001_0300_10: Thank you so much! It was really thrilling!
search_specialcos02/4004_1001_0400_10:
We’re honored to hear that. It seems our efforts
paid off!
search_specialcos02/4004_1001_0500_10:
Now then, you still have a bit more puzzle solving
to do. Please continue, and take care!
search_specialcos02/4005_1001_0100_10: This is...where we started, isn’t it?
search_specialcos02/4005_1001_0200_10:
Welcome to the tea party! I’ve been waiting
for you!
search_specialcos02/4005_1001_0400_10:
And look at that—the first ones back are Lillie
and [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Well done!
search_specialcos02/4005_1001_0500_10: But do you think you can solve my puzzle, too?
search_specialcos02/4006_1001_0100_10:
We’ve reached the last puzzle! It may be difficult,
but it won’t stop me from having tea with
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! Let’s solve it!
search_specialcos02/4006_1001_0200_10:
You certainly seem raring to go. But you’ll need
more than enthusiasm to solve my puzzle!
search_specialcos02/4006_1001_0300_10:
After all, this puzzle was created by none other
than the queen and Pokémon Professor—me!
search_specialcos02/4006_1001_0500_10:
Yes, I am! I thought that by becoming a queen,
I could better understand my partner Tsareena!
search_specialcos02/4006_1001_0600_10:
Tsareena has an air of nobility and beauty, perfect
for the role of a queen.
search_specialcos02/4006_1001_0700_10:
So I’m trying to emulate her. Studying is important,
but it doesn’t solve everything!
search_specialcos02/4006_1001_0800_10: Anyway, back to business: the final puzzle!
search_specialcos02/4006_0401_1100_10:
It’s tough to tell which of these is Lillie’s partner
Pokémon, isn’t it?
search_specialcos02/4006_0402_1300_10: Finding it is your final puzzle!
search_specialcos02/4006_1001_1400_10:
Polteageist come in two forms: Antique Form and
Phony Form.
search_specialcos02/4006_1001_1500_10:
And Lillie’s is an Antique Form Polteageist.
So...which one is it?
search_specialcos02/4006_1001_1600_10:
Oh, and of course Lillie would figure this out
instantly, so this question is for
you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
search_specialcos02/4006_1001_1700_10:
Awww... That’s really frustrating, but I guess it’s
only fair.
search_specialcos02/4006_1001_1800_10:
I’ll be cheering you on from the
sidelines, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
search_specialcos02/4006_1001_1900_10:
Here’s a hint: there’s one particular characteristic
somewhere that only Antique Form Polteageist has!
search_specialcos02/4006_1001_2000_10:
All right! Can you tell which one it
is, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?!
search_specialcos02/4007_1001_0100_10: Amazing! We did it! We finished first!
search_specialcos02/4007_1001_0200_10:
And it’s all thanks to you! Thank you so
much, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
search_specialcos02/4007_1001_0600_10:
I brought some Polteageist, but there’s one more
here than I had.
search_specialcos02/4007_1001_0700_10:
I thought maybe Lear had brought one to
help me out, but if he’d done that, he would
have told me...
search_specialcos02/4007_1001_0800_10:
Wha... Whaaat?! And now it’s suddenly acting all
weird, too?!
search_specialcos02/4007_1001_0900_10:
Please, calm down, Polteageist! What’s going
on with—?!
search_specialcos02/4007_1001_1100_10: Team Break! What are you doing here?!
search_specialcos02/4007_1001_1200_10: I’ve been following you this whole time...
search_specialcos02/4007_1001_1300_10:
Or, to be more precise, I’ve been trying to collect
that Antique Form Polteageist!
search_specialcos02/4007_1001_1500_10:
Antique Form Polteageist are exceedingly rare.
They’re the real deal!
search_specialcos02/4007_1001_1600_10:
But all I have is a Phony Form Polteageist...
A fake!
search_specialcos02/4007_1001_1700_10:
So I’ll be taking your Antique Form Polteageist,
if you please!
